0.text: Innate: Vladimir gains (3.3% bonus health) as  ability power and (160% AP) as  bonus health. These two bonuses do not stack with each other.
0.html: Innate: Vladimir gains (3.3% bonus health) as  ability power and (160% AP) as  bonus health. These two bonuses do not stack with each other.

0.text: Active: Vladimir drains blood from the target enemy, dealing magic damage and  healing himself. He then generates a stack of  Bloodthirst over the  cooldown, which is displayed in his secondary resource bar.
0.html: Active: Vladimir drains blood from the target enemy, dealing magic damage and healing himself. He then generates a stack of Bloodthirst over the  cooldown, which is displayed in his secondary resource bar.

1.text: At 2 stacks, Vladimir gains 10% / 20% / 30% / 40% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds, and enters Crimson Rush while the  Bloodthirst depletes over 2.5 seconds. The  Bloodthirst depletes 75% slower during  Sanguine Pool,  Tides of Blood, or  stasis.
1.html: At 2 stacks, Vladimir gains 10% / 20% / 30% / 40% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds, and enters Crimson Rush while the Bloodthirst depletes over 2.5 seconds. The Bloodthirst depletes 75% slower during Sanguine Pool, Tides of Blood, or stasis.

2.text: Crimson Rush Bonus: Transfusion consumes all  Bloodthirst to deal  85% increased damage and heal Vladimir for an additional 30 − 200 (based on level) (+ 5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) missing health), reduced to 35% against  minions.
2.html: Crimson Rush Bonus: Transfusion consumes all Bloodthirst to deal 85% increased damage and heal Vladimir for an additional 30 − 200 (based on level) (+ 5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) missing health), reduced to 35% against minions.

0.text: Active: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming  untargetable and  ghosted for 2 seconds. He also gains  37.5% bonus movement speed that decays exponentially over 1 second.
0.html: Active: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable and ghosted for 2 seconds. He also gains  37.5% bonus movement speed that decays exponentially over 1 second.

1.text: Enemies within the pool are  slowed by 40% and dealt magic damage every 0.5 seconds over the duration. Vladimir  heals himself for 15% of the pre-mitigation damage dealt by Sanguine Pool.
1.html: Enemies within the pool are slowed by 40% and dealt magic damage every 0.5 seconds over the duration. Vladimir heals himself for 15% of the pre-mitigation damage dealt by Sanguine Pool.

2.text: Vladimir cannot use basic attacks or abilities during Sanguine Pool, but can still move. If  Tides of Blood is charging at the time of Sanguine Pool's activation, that ability may still be recast.
2.html: Vladimir cannot use basic attacks or abilities during Sanguine Pool, but can still move. If Tides of Blood is charging at the time of Sanguine Pool's activation, that ability may still be recast.

4.text: COST: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8% (BASED ON CHARGE TIME) MAXIMUM HEALTH

0.text: Active: Vladimir  charges for up to 1.5 seconds,  slowing himself by 20% if he charges for more than 1 second. Tides of Blood can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or if  interrupted.
0.html: Active: Vladimir charges for up to 1.5 seconds, slowing himself by 20% if he charges for more than 1 second. Tides of Blood can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or if interrupted.

1.text: Recast: Vladimir unleashes a nova of 15 blood bolts that each deal magic damage to the first enemy hit, increased based on charge time, up to the first second.
1.html: Recast: Vladimir unleashes a nova of 15 blood bolts that each deal magic damage to the first enemy hit, increased based on charge time, up to the first second.

2.text: If Tides of Blood was charged for at least 1 second, enemies hit are also  slowed for 0.5 seconds.
2.html: If Tides of Blood was charged for at least 1 second, enemies hit are also slowed for 0.5 seconds.

3.text: Enemies can intercept multiple bolts, but can be damaged only once.
3.html: Enemies can intercept multiple bolts, but can be damaged only once.

4.text: If Vladimir is below 12% of his maximum health, Tides of Blood will not cost any health.
4.html: If Vladimir is below 12% of his maximum health, Tides of Blood will not cost any health.

0.text: Active: Vladimir spreads a virulent plague at the target location that infects enemies hit for 4 seconds,  increasing the damage they take from all sources by 10%.
0.html: Active: Vladimir spreads a virulent plague at the target location that infects enemies hit for 4 seconds, increasing the damage they take from all sources by 10%.

1.text: After the duration, the infection bursts to deal magic damage to all infected targets. Infected  champions also have their blood siphoned to Vladimir over 0.4 seconds for him to harvest,  healing him, reduced by 40% for each subsequent champion.
1.html: After the duration, the infection bursts to deal magic damage to all infected targets. Infected champions also have their blood siphoned to Vladimir over 0.4 seconds for him to harvest, healing him, reduced by 40% for each subsequent champion.

Crimson Rush Bonus: Transfusion consumes all  Bloodthirst to deal  85% increased damage and heal Vladimir for an additional 30 − 200 (based on level) (+ 5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) missing health), reduced to 35% against  minions.
Enemies within the pool are  slowed by 40% and dealt magic damage every 0.5 seconds over the duration. Vladimir  heals himself for 15% of the pre-mitigation damage dealt by Sanguine Pool.
Enemies within the pool are  slowed by 40% and dealt magic damage every 0.5 seconds over the duration. Vladimir  heals himself for 15% of the pre-mitigation damage dealt by Sanguine Pool.
Recast: Vladimir unleashes a nova of 15 blood bolts that each deal magic damage to the first enemy hit, increased based on charge time, up to the first second.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Vladimir drains blood from the target enemy, dealing magic damage and  healing himself. He then generates a stack of  Bloodthirst over the  cooldown, which is displayed in his secondary resource bar.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Enemies within the pool are  slowed by 40% and dealt magic damage every 0.5 seconds over the duration. Vladimir  heals himself for 15% of the pre-mitigation damage dealt by Sanguine Pool.
Recast: Vladimir unleashes a nova of 15 blood bolts that each deal magic damage to the first enemy hit, increased based on charge time, up to the first second.

flatPartType: % BASED ON CHARGE TIME MAXIMUM HEALTH
